experiences.description:
• Contributed to the development of an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) centralizing and standardizing all incoming applications, regardless of source or format.
• Helped design a global and fully exploitable candidate database (CV-thèque) enabling large-scale recruitment analytics and automated data processing.
• Integrated AI-based CV parsing and classification to extract key skills, experience, and education from unstructured documents.
• Developed a machine-learning matching module to rank candidates according to job requirements by using vector similarity (embeddings) and supervised scoring models.
Technologies: Python, NLP embeddings, ML ranking models, data pipelines, CV parsing, workflow automation, recruitment analytics, ATS architecture

• Developed and deployed a collateral optimization model combining linear programming and heuristics.

• Performed statistical analyses and predictive modeling on credit data to extract decision-making patterns.

experiences.position_title: Modélisation et implémentation d'un système de placement dans l’avion
experiences.description:
- Formulation of mathematical models for the optimization of passenger placement, considering multiple constraints (aircraft balancing, grouped placement of passengers traveling together, and taking into account passengers with reduced mobility).
- Evaluation of the performance of the passenger placement system using metrics such as boarding time, satisfaction rate of each type of passenger, and overall customer satisfaction.
- Resolution of the mathematical problem using Gurobi and other optimization algorithms.
- Formulation of mathematical models for the optimization of passenger placement, considering multiple constraints (aircraft balancing, grouped placement of passengers traveling together, and taking into account passengers with reduced mobility). - Evaluation of the performance of the passenger placement system using metrics such as boarding time, satisfaction rate of each type of passenger, and overall customer satisfaction. - Resolution of the mathematical problem using Gurobi and other optimization algorithms.

experiences.position_title: Diagnosis and prognosis of bearing faults in high-speed trains
experiences.institution_name: SIANA - Société Marocaine de Maintenance des Rames à Grande Vitesse
experiences.description:
- Data processing using SQL including the creation of SQL queries to calculate several statistical features.
- Using clustering algorithms such as K-means to label data initially unlabelled.
- Using several classification algorithms, such as KNN, SVM, Artificial Neural Networks, and Autoencoders, to classify types of rolling defects after evaluations using the Scikit and Keras libraries.
